title: Silent failure in listReadyIssues returns empty array on error
description: CRITICAL: When bd ready command fails, the function returns empty array instead of propagating the error. Users see no issues and don't know the system is broken. Location: src/core/beadsService.ts:127-131

title: Silent failure in exportIssuesWithDeps returns empty array on error
description: CRITICAL: When bd export command fails, the function returns empty array instead of propagating the error. Same issue as listReadyIssues. Location: src/core/beadsService.ts:183-187

title: Auto-refresh interval silently ignores promise rejections
description: Partially fixed: Auto-refresh now catches errors and logs them, but does NOT update UI error state. Users see stale data with no indication that refreshes are failing. Need to add setError call in catch block. Location: src/cli/App.tsx:81-91

title: BeadsIssue.status should be union type not string
description: status field is string but should be 'open' | 'in_progress' | 'blocked' | 'closed'. Multiple files do string comparisons that could fail silently with typos. Location: src/core/types.ts:13

title: BeadsIssue.issue_type should be union type not string
description: issue_type field is string but should be 'bug' | 'feature' | 'epic' | 'chore' | 'task'. Icon mapping in IssueRow.tsx could fail silently. Location: src/core/types.ts:16

title: No unit tests for core utility functions
description: formatTimeAgo, sortIssues, validateRecentWindowMinutes have zero unit test coverage despite being pure functions. High risk of regressions. Location: src/core/utils.ts

title: Fix button alignment
description: Buttons are misaligned on mobile

title: Potential infinite loop in IssueTree depth computation
description: computeDepth function has no cycle detection. Circular parent references (A->B->A) would cause stack overflow. Location: src/cli/components/IssueTree.tsx:20-34

title: Command path shell metacharacter validation incomplete
description: getBdCommand validation regex misses newlines, backslash, parentheses, quotes. Should use allowlist instead. Location: src/core/beadsService.ts:98-102

title: process.exit(0) without renderer cleanup
description: Pressing 'q' in CLI calls process.exit(0) directly, bypassing OpenTUI renderer cleanup. Could leave terminal in inconsistent state. Location: src/cli/App.tsx:153

title: JSON parse failures only warn if >10% fail
description: When parsing JSONL, parse failures are counted but user only warned if >10% fail. Should always notify about missing issues. Location: src/core/beadsService.ts:209-227

title: React should be in devDependencies
description: React is only used for CLI which is compiled to standalone binary. Being in dependencies adds it unnecessarily to VS Code extension package. Location: package.json:129-131

title: Default no-op logger silently discards errors before configure
description: CRITICAL: Default logger is no-op functions that silently discard log messages. If configure is never called or called late, errors are invisible. Default should write to console.warn/console.error. Location: src/core/beadsService.ts:24-29

title: isBeadsInitialized returns false on permission errors without distinction
description: When checking if beads is initialized, non-ENOENT errors like permission denied cause function to return false as if beads simply is not initialized. This masks real filesystem problems. Should distinguish not_found vs error. Location: src/core/beadsService.ts:82-91

title: SortableIssue.status type mismatch with IssueStatus union
description: SortableIssue.status is string but BeadsIssue.status is IssueStatus union type. This inconsistency could cause subtle type issues when using sortIssues with BeadsIssue arrays. Location: src/core/types.ts:47-52

title: BeadsResult should be discriminated union to prevent illegal states
description: BeadsResult<T> allows illegal states where success and error fields are inconsistent. A failed result can have data set to anything, and successful result can have an error string. Should use discriminated union pattern. Location: src/core/types.ts:55-59

title: Missing unit tests for IssueTree circular reference detection
description: The circular reference detection logic in IssueTree.tsx computeDepth function is critical for preventing infinite loops in the UI but has no unit tests. Should test: direct circular ref A->A, indirect A->B->C->A, and normal hierarchy. Location: src/cli/components/IssueTree.tsx:20-46

title: PR #9 Code Review Findings
description: Track code review findings from PR #9 (computeIssueDepths extraction with circular reference tests)

title: JSDoc comment inaccuracy for cycle depth behavior
description: The JSDoc for computeIssueDepths claims cycles are 'treated as roots (depth 0)' but self-references actually get depth 1 due to how cycle detection works. The test correctly expects depth 1 but contradicts the JSDoc. Location: src/core/utils.ts:8

title: Cycle tests assert termination but not depth values
description: The circular reference tests only verify that computation terminates (result.has('A').toBe(true)) but don't assert actual depth values. Could miss regressions if processing order changes. Consider asserting specific depths or max depth constraint. Location: src/utils.test.ts:88-127

title: E2E tests fail in hooks - see issues from main database instead of test workspace
description: When running E2E tests via pre-push hook, the VSCode extension sees 37 issues from the main project database instead of the 3 test issues in the isolated workspace. Tests pass when run directly. Root cause: VSCode may be inheriting workspace context from parent or bd command may be walking up directories. Location: test/extension.test.ts + .husky/pre-push

title: Add unit tests for useJsonlMode config behavior
description: The conditional --no-db logic in listReadyIssues and exportIssuesWithDeps has no unit test coverage. E2E tests validate the fix works, but unit tests would catch regressions faster. Should test: useJsonlMode=true adds --no-db, useJsonlMode=false does not add --no-db. Location: src/beadsService.test.ts

title: Consider helper function for building bd command args
description: The --no-db flag is added in two places (listReadyIssues and exportIssuesWithDeps). Consider creating a helper function to build command arguments consistently to prevent future bd command additions from forgetting the pattern. Example: buildBdArgs(['ready', '--json']) would return ['--no-db', 'ready', '--json'] when useJsonlMode is true. Location: src/core/beadsService.ts

title: CLI bdx has no way to enable useJsonlMode
description: The CLI (src/cli/index.tsx) calls configure({}) with an empty config object, so useJsonlMode is never set for CLI users. CLI users who run bdx in a subdirectory of a larger project with multiple beads databases will get unexpected behavior. Consider adding a --no-db flag to the CLI. Location: src/cli/index.tsx:60

title: Security warning in getBdCommand uses debug-level logging
description: getBdCommand() logs shell metacharacter rejection warnings via log() which is silent by default. Security-relevant events should use warn() to ensure they are visible. Location: src/core/beadsService.ts:107-120

title: Missing input validation in buildBdArgs
description: buildBdArgs accepts args: string[] but performs no runtime validation. If caller passes null/undefined, the spread operator will throw. Consider adding defensive guard. Location: src/core/beadsService.ts:126-131

title: Publish BeadsX to Open VSX Registry
description:
Add automated publishing to Open VSX Registry (open-vsx.org) alongside existing VS Code Marketplace publishing. This enables users of VSCodium, Gitpod, and other VS Code forks to install BeadsX.

**Background:**
- Open VSX is a vendor-neutral registry for VS Code extensions maintained by Eclipse Foundation
- We already have `ovsx` CLI installed and a `publish:ovsx` script
- Our release.yml already references Open VSX in release notes but doesn't actually publish there

**Requirements:**
1. Add Open VSX publish step to GitHub Actions release workflow
2. User needs to create Open VSX account and namespace (manual steps)
3. Generate OVSX_PAT secret in GitHub repo settings

Open issues should always be visible regardless of parent status.

title: No maximum limit on auto-reload interval
description:
MEDIUM: User can set autoReloadInterval to very small values causing excessive CPU usage.

Location: beadsTreeDataProvider.ts:101, package.json:72-77

Root cause: package.json has minimum: 0 but no maximum. User could set interval to 0.1s causing 600+ refreshes per minute.

Fix: Add maximum in package.json and validate in code:
```json
"beadsx.autoReloadInterval": {
  "type": "number",
  "default": 10,
  "minimum": 0,
  "maximum": 3600,
  "description": "Interval in seconds (0 to disable, max 1 hour)"
}
```

Also add code validation:
```typescript
const intervalSeconds = Math.min(config.get('autoReloadInterval', 10), 3600);
```
close_reason: Added maximum 3600s in both package.json and code validation with clamping
